Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さん……あなたは平気なんですか？ 工場長さんは、あなたのお姉さんを……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>... are you doing all right? Considering what happened with the factory manager and your sister...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ムカついてるさ。 でもな、おれだって何もできなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty pissed off about it. But it's not like I could've done anything...

Entry.JapaneseText: おれがもっと強けりゃ、姉貴を守ってやれた…… あんな風に工場をめちゃくちゃにする事も……
Entry.EnglishText: If only I were stronger, I could've protected my sister... And I also did a number on the factory...

Entry.JapaneseText: だからおれは強くなるんだ!! 姉貴を助け、<Blue>王の盾<White>をブッつぶしてやる!!
Entry.EnglishText: So that's why I'm gonna get stronger! I'm gonna save my sister and bust up the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> while I'm at it!
